Determine the value of the expression by first constructing the twoâ€™s complement representation (signed int)
of the operands and then performing the bitwise operation on them. Show your work.

(a) 24 | -2038
   24 = 0000 0000  0000 0000  0000 0000  0001 1000
-2038 = 1111 1111  1111 1111  1111 1000  0000 1010
   OR = 1111 1111  1111 1111  1111 1000  0001 1010

(b) (~23) & 300124
    23 = 0000 0000  0000 0000  0000 0000  0001 0111
   ~23 = 1111 1111  1111 1111  1111 1111  1110 1000
300124 = 0000 0000  0000 0100  1001 0100  0101 1100
   AND = 0000 0000  0000 0100  1001 1100  0100 1000

(c) -208 ^ 19
-208 = 1111 1111  1111 1111  1111 1111  0011 0000
  19 = 0000 0000  0000 0000  0000 0000  0001 0011
 XOR = 1111 1111  1111 1111  1111 1111  0010 0011

(d) -34576 >>> 5
-34576 = 1111 1111  1111 1111  0111 1000  1111 0000
   >>> = 0000 0111  1111 1111  1111 1011  1100 0111

(e) -347000 >> 11
-347000 = 1111 1111  1111 1010  1011 0100  1000 1000
     >> = 0000 0000  0000 0000  1111 1111  0101 0110

(f) -4567 << 6
-4567 = 0000 0000  0000 0000  1110 1110  0010 1001
   << = 1111 1111  1111 1011  1000 1010  0100 0000
